PreActivityText: Now that you have an understanding of the purpose of different types of headings and the importance of structuring your reports with clear headings, identify which are descriptive headings and which are functional headings.

QuestionNodes.question: Background
QuestionNodes.wrong: An odd number is a number not divisible by 2.
